Tourist AKA Gennady Korotkevich is looking for a new interesting number system. This number system is comprises only of 5 and 6
 Your task is to help him create a program to tell him the k^th number of this new number system, since he is busy winning some other coding championship.

Input

The first line contains T, the number of test cases.
The next T lines each contain an integer K.

 

Output
For each test case you must print the k^th number of this new system.
 

Constraints

1 ≤ T ≤ 100
1 ≤ T ≤ 10^15

 

Example

4
1
5
10
12


Output:
5
65
566
656
